themes.name: Travel
conversation_prompts: Where did you like to travel?
What places did you visit?
Tell me about a special trip

themes.name: Birthday
conversation_prompts: How did you celebrate birthdays?
What was your favorite birthday memory?
What kind of birthday cake did you like?

themes.name: Weather
conversation_prompts: What kind of weather do you enjoy?
Do you remember any special weather days?
What did you do on rainy/sunny days?

themes.name: Clothing
conversation_prompts: What did you like to wear?
Do you remember fashion trends?
Did you have a special outfit?

themes.name: School
conversation_prompts: Tell me about your school days
What was your favorite subject?
Did you have a favorite teacher?

themes.name: Food
conversation_prompts: What was your favorite food growing up?
Did you enjoy cooking?
What foods remind you of home?

themes.name: Holidays
conversation_prompts: What holidays were special in your family?
Tell me about holiday traditions
What holiday foods did you enjoy?

themes.name: Seasons
conversation_prompts: What's your favorite season?
What did you do in spring/summer/fall/winter?
What seasonal activities did you enjoy?

themes.name: Pets
conversation_prompts: Tell me about pets you've had
What was your favorite animal growing up?
Did you have a special pet story?

themes.name: Music
conversation_prompts: What was your favorite song when you were young?
Did you ever dance to this kind of music?
What music did your family listen to together?
